heaven: liked to eat worms as a child. I can appreciate that.
played chess against a dog... and lost.
likes to cover themselves in mud, and squeal like a pig.
... collects stamps. (Really? That's all? How boring.)
keeps a diary detailing their extensive criminal record.
tries to summon a demon now and then, just for company.
woke up two hours late today.
once murdered ten people using only a balloon, a paperclip, and six packets of bubble gum.
